name: Big Mac (itch)
description:
Within an outskirt of a small populated island, lived a young man named Big Mac by the community. His life was very normal until one certain fateful day will change the course of history forever.

A 2D Top Down game with pixelated art style. Players are encouraged to explore the available areas and find more connective story of the game. Following a day in the life of Big Mac as he unfold the mystery on the island.

And find out how that fateful day ended for him, in: Big Mac!
